FuncDef: Thegroup-prefixfor a static-rp defines a range of multicast-ip-addresses for which a certain RP is applicable.

ParaDef.Info: Defines the mask of the multicast-ip-address. Values-4 to 32.
The subnet mask in dotted decimal notation. Values-0.0.0.0 to 255.255.255.255 (network bits all 1 and host bits all 0).
